Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Enzyme Inhibitor/Acetylcholinesterase Inhibitor/Rivastigmine
Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Enzyme Inhibitor/Acetylcholinesterase Inhibitor/Rivastigmine Tartrate
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: The tartrate salt form of rivastigmine, a phenylcarbamate derivative exhibiting cognitive stimulating property. Although the mechanism of action has not been fully elucidated, rivastigmine tartrate may bind reversibly to cholinesterase, thereby decreasing the breakdown of acetylcholine and enhancing cholinergic function.
